name: passbolt
tagline: A team focused password manager for secure sharing
description: Passbolt is a self-hosted, API-first password manager designed for team collaboration. It features encrypted password sharing, user controls, browser extensions, and auditing tools.

features.title: End-to-End Encryption
features.description: End-to-end encryption ensures passwords are encrypted on client side before storage, protecting against server breaches

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Share passwords securely with team members or groups while maintaining encryption and access controls

features.title: User Management
features.description: Invite users, assign roles, and manage permissions to control who can access and share passwords

features.title: Audit Logs
features.description: Track all password access, modifications, and sharing activities for security compliance and accountability

features.title: Groups And Folders
features.description: Organize passwords into folders and share with groups for streamlined team-based access management

features.title: Password Generator
features.description: Built-in generator creates strong, random passwords with customizable length and character requirements

features.title: REST API
features.description: RESTful API enables automation, integration with CI/CD pipelines, and custom workflow development
